title: Bug 27103[Linked Resources] Change all copy/move operations to use IResource.SHALLOW
description: Bug 27103[Linked Resources] Change all copy/move operations to use IResource.SHALLOW
OB: build 20021119Core has changed the default behavior of copy/move to do a deep copy of linkedresources.
EB: Need to change all copy/operations in platform UI to explicitlyspecify the SHALLOW flag in order to keep the current behavior (copy/move thelink).
